meanings.definition: Relating to the sense of taste.
meanings.sent1: The gustatory experience of the sweet ice cream delighted her taste buds.
meanings.sent2: The chef's gustatory creations always left customers wanting more.
meanings.sent3: His gustatory preferences were so specific that he only ate green foods on Fridays.
meanings.sent4: The gustatory journey through the exotic spices was like a flavorful adventure.
meanings.sent5: The gustatory sensation of the tangy lemonade lingered on her palate.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to the act of tasting.
meanings.sent1: The gustatory evaluation of the new dish was essential for the chef's feedback.
meanings.sent2: Her gustatory skills were put to the test during the blind taste test.
meanings.sent3: The gustatory challenge of identifying different flavors blindfolded was both fun and tricky.
meanings.sent4: The gustatory exploration of various cuisines broadened her culinary knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The gustatory experiment with unusual food combinations was surprisingly enjoyable.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sense of taste or the act of tasting.
meanings.sent1: The gustatory pleasure of savoring the homemade pie was unmatched.
meanings.sent2: His gustatory adventures led him to discover new favorite foods.
meanings.sent3: The gustatory excitement of trying a new dish made her day brighter.
meanings.sent4: The gustatory journey through different cultures' cuisines was a delightful experience.
meanings.sent5: The gustatory memory of the spicy curry stayed with her long after the meal.
